summary: Implements a Segment data holder and a SegmentedButton control for the Flet UI framework, allowing developers to build grouped button widgets with customizable icons, labels, values, styling, animations, tooltips, badges, and responsive layout.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use, configurable segmented button widget that lets applications present multiple selectable options in a compact, stylable form, enhancing user interaction and interface consistency within Flet-based projects.
